title: The future of life insurance
description: As the world constantly evolves and changes, so too does the life insurance industry, which is preparing for a multitude of challenges, particularly in three areas: interest rates, regulatory mandates and technology (software, underwriting tools and distribution platforms). In a Risk.net roundtable convened in collaboration with Milliman, life insurance leaders discuss challenges and strategies to future-proof the industry while creating the greatest possible value for policy-holders
